removed pov and tightened prose. /* The Michael Jackson Trial */
Added relevant article with user discussion on Nancy Grace
Summary Adjust: Duckett is a Suspect. Opinion is notable incident no longer worthy of summary.
/* Missing white women */ "Syndrome" not mentioned at all in article.
/* Public criticism of potential [[media bias]] */ rm "original research" tags - citations in same paragraph provide examples
/* Suicide of interviewee */ Unreliable Source removal, find reliable source, preferably a source in business over two decades.
/* Early Life */ Add CNN Profile Biography Reference
/* Elizabeth Smart kidnapping */ Failure to stay on topic is not criticism, just doing a poor job as host.
Copyedit: Section retitling, adjusted for top down view of relevant sections, if any.
Copyedit: Rearranged sections, spellign mistakes, POV section title removal and merge to other section
/* Appellate courts */ Copyedit:: NPOV. Appealate commentary is notable, let reader determine if it is "blistering"
/* Appellate courts */ WP:BLP removal, potential Libel.
/* Controversy over fiancÃ©'s murder trial */ Copyedit: NPOV wording
Copyedit: neutral wording, clearer prose. Served is for elected positions. Felony implies major. Clerked isn't a verb.
copyedit: Controversial unnecessary. Notorious implies POV, neutral factual statement
/* Suicide of interviewee */ basic syntax and spelling
Removed POV, added CNs as appropriate.
Reworded to remove POV, asked for a few citations
/* Defense */ doesn't need to be a sub-section
word choice in intro; we had two instances of "following" in the same line
/* Personality */ still too pov, filled with weasel words.
/* Content of CNN Show is Unimportant */ this is really, really POV. Please remember that Wiki is supposed to be neutral
While she can easily be described as such, this is probably not the best place for it.
/* Suicide of interviewee */ fix possible misunderstanding
/* Influence in suicide of guest */ +info and reffing
